(ooc: yan is giving me the galactors and im giving him Cledar, Rixer, Blyer, 
and Forrior. And the element is still blocking any dececticon and pred 
transmissiosn, so stop chatting over the com!! :)

+++Mantle Cinder Mist Aqua Rubble Supernova Scral Slasys Vycir Cyndro+++

Mantle hovered out of the Element behind Epyon and then looked around the 
battlefield to locate his team. He flew up to them all checked them over.

"Do you have enough energy to form Element again?" He asked, and smiled when 
he got positive responces from all of them. Mantle gave the order to 
combine, and they all did and formed Element in a few seconds. Element 
looked around and saw Megatron heading for the Cybertronian Fire. He ran 
toward Megatron and fired two missiles and twenty shots right at him. This 
time no exuses like "Megatron was out of range" could be used, because 
Element was well within range to fire at Megatron.


The Galactor jets recieved Zardus's orders and then came around for another 
pass. They saw Astroblast heading for the Cybertronian Fire, and set a 
head-on collision toward him. They approached him quickly, though one of 
them was cloaked and Astroblast wouldn't see it, and then fired two missiles 
each as soon as they were close. Both of them pulled up to avoid a 
collision, but the missiles kept going right at Astroblast.


The nanobots were finished with their work on the insides of the 
Cybertronian Fire. They had taken everything from the inside, and then had 
transported it to the Element and were installing everything now. They had 
gotten the solar panels and the shield generators as soon as the shields 
went down, and right now they were installing them on the Element. If 
Astroblast were to reach the Cybertronian Fire and break through the shell, 
he would find himself inside a very large and just as empty dome, but there 
was no way to tell that from the outside. The nanobots began to weaken the 
bottom of the dome and got ready to collapse it as soon as they wanted.


Cyndro was very happy with the progress that his nanobots made. The shield 
generators and solar panels that they brought in from the Cybertronian Fire 
would help alot in this battle. They were being recharged now, but they 
would soon be up and running. A few shots hit Cyndro's shields, but they 
were minor so he just returned fire with plasm shots.

Cyndro didn't have too much to do, but he had to get everything programmed 
to work with the Element, so he got to that. But he'd heard Epyon say 
something about more supplies before Epyon left, so he couldn't wait to get 
more materials again!
